channel.title: 317 [PI] Doors
channel.description:
Hello,
- What i want to get help with = * [b]1)[/b] adding a door that can get open and closed [b]2)[/b] - Found how!
- What i've tried to do. * [b]1)[/b] I just added the id of the door(s) to actionhandler and than above[code]Server.objectHandler.doorHandling(objectType, c.objectX, c.objectY, 0);[/code] Worked all just fine. But than i added a similiar code like this in door.cfg [code]door = 3253 3266 0 0 0 //blablabla gate[/code] If i run the server after adding that code to door.cfg -> i get [code]a java exception has occurred[/code] [b]2)[/b] - found how!
I hope someone could help!
Peace

item.title: 317 [PI] Doors
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

TheoLAlex:

Not quite sure what you are asking, All i know is… To make the door open and shut is from the door.cfg, if you want the door to actually do something, Its Actionhandler.

Opening and shutting is considered “doing something”. Your statement is a bit mixed.
If you want to operate the door as a door, use your door.cfg, if it’s not working, post the code related to it.
If you want to add extra stuff to the door (such as a message, random reward, or etc), you’ll want to add code to the ActionHandler. Alternatively, you can also hard-code the door to open and close.

Read full topic

item.description:
@webwebwebby wrote:

Are you looking to add a brand new door and make it open and close, or are you trying to open and close an already existing door in your server?

  • What i want to get help with =
